title: Ready for production
content: YASSB comes with everything you need to build a production-ready static web site. HTML. From prototyping to packaging styles and scripts, everything is taken care of, ready to ship.

title: Extendable as you need
content: YASSB can be extended with custom renderers and directives, written in JavaScript or TypeScript with JSX and TSX support out-of-the-box. Every step of the build process can be customized as well.

title: In a language you know
content: YASSB is shipped as a regular JavaScript node package and is entirely written in TypeScript. Everything runs on well known technologies, popular libraries and reliable packages, like Webpack and alikes.

title: Built for speed
content: YASSB runs on the latest LTS version of node and takes full advantage of its capabilties. During development the watch mode recompiles the project selectively, and with live reload your browser is refreshed instantly.
